channel.title: Comments on: How did God get invented? Answer to a Six year old
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Serge Tittley
item.dc:creator: Serge Tittley
item.description: Lovely post. Archbishop Williams' compassion comes through in small ways - his response to Lulu - and in larger fashion. I find his breadth of knowledge impressive, particularly when it comes to wedding western theology with the teachings of the Orthodox east and patristics. And, as anyone who watched the recent royal wedding can attest, he does possess a truly fine Welshman's voice.
item.content:encoded: Lovely post. Archbishop Williams’ compassion comes through in small ways – his response to Lulu – and in larger fashion. I find his breadth of knowledge impressive, particularly when it comes to wedding western theology with the teachings of the Orthodox east and patristics. And, as anyone who watched the recent royal wedding can attest, he does possess a truly fine Welshman’s voice.
